A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The hype can make some people feel a little let down - but just fans of Star Wars (not the nitpick crowd) and I am sure kids who are newer to the series will enjoy it\, a lot.
Empire Strikes Back is always my favorite which may be due to nostalgia\, and it was a great movie.  The Last Jedi has a lot of story to tell\, to wrap up and to set the stage for the new SW fans.  These movies are for kids - us adults who have been fans our whole life need to jump on boaord and enjoy the new generation of SW.  I was able to do that quite easily.  
I do understand some of the negativity to some small random insertions during the movie\, that were not grown or explained\, but that is how new characters are introduced.
Good movie - just different for long time fans.  100% go see this movie.
